page.title: 12Pubs in Colney Heath
page.content: In Colney Heath there are four pubs. They are called {The Queen's Head, {The Crooked Billet, The Chalkdrawers and{The Cock. The Crooked Billet}got its name because a billet is a log and it's crooked as well.{The Cock}got its name because they had cock fighting over on the common. In cock fighting people bet which cock would win.{The {Queen's Head }might have got its name because Lady Jane Grey or Mary Queen of Scots got their heads chopped off. {The Chalkdrawers}got its name because they used to dig up chalk to improve the fields. There were two other pubs{The Gardeners Arms}and {The Plough.
